title: The Artificial Intelligence Value Chain: A Critical Appraisal. [Spanish Version]
summary: The artificial intelligence value chain is one of the main concepts underpinning the European legislation on the subject, especially the Artificial Intelligence Act. It is an economic concept that has become a legal one. i.e., a concept of legal governance, due to its continued use in policy documents and legal texts.
